title: Everyone contact Cal Cummingham & tell him not to drop out
selftext:
Everyone msg/email Cal Dumbass and tell him not to drop out despite being a jackass: info@calfornc.com We need to win the Senate or it will all be for nothing. We can't waste this big opportunity when the GOP has an inherent advantage in the Senate.

https://twitter.com/CalforNC

https://www.instagram.com/calfornc/

https://www.facebook.com/calfornc
